title: Celkuser Plus Size Summer V Neck Casual Cold Shoulder Floral Boho Dress for Women Empire Waist Cozy Sundress with Pocket
description: Style：This short sleeve cold shoulder floral A line boho dress is swing and cozy the elast waist for a better fit. This dress is designed with pockets to make you easy to pack small things on the go.
Fabric：This dress is made of lightweight, cozy and non see through fabric is stretchy and comes in sizes 1xl-4xl, refer to the size chart for exact measurements.

Occasions:The unique cold shoulder design and patchwork hem of this dress is simple and elegant suitable for beach/party/wedding guests/travel/potluck/date/dinner/church/prom and many other occasions.

People：This dress is suitable for ladies of many body types, the waist has a tie and elastic band, if you feel slightly big you can adjust it according to your needs, this dress will be a good choice for you in summer.

Washing：The dress is likely to be machine washable in cold water on a gentle cycle to preserve the fabric's softness and the garment's shape. Air drying is recommended, and if needed, a quick iron on a low setting will keep it looking pristine.
